detaileddescription.para:
Create a spinbox objects
par
pointer to an object, it will be the parent of the new spinbox
copy
pointer to a spinbox object, if not NULL then the new object will be copied from it
pointer to the created spinbox Create a spinbox object
par
pointer to an object, it will be the parent of the new spinbox
copy
pointer to a spinbox object, if not NULL then the new object will be copied from it
pointer to the created spinbox

Set a style of a spinbox.
templ
pointer to template object
type
which style should be set
style
pointer to a style

Set spinbox value
spinbox
pointer to spinbox
i
value to be set

Set spinbox digit format (digit count and decimal format)
spinbox
pointer to spinbox
digit_count
number of digit excluding the decimal separator and the sign
separator_position
number of digit before the decimal point. If 0, decimal point is not shown

Set spinbox step
spinbox
pointer to spinbox
step
steps on increment/decrement

Set spinbox value range
spinbox
pointer to spinbox
range_min
maximum value, inclusive
range_max
minimum value, inclusive

Set spinbox left padding in digits count (added between sign and first digit)
spinbox
pointer to spinbox
cb
Callback function called on value change event

Get style of a spinbox.
templ
pointer to template object
type
which style should be get
style pointer to the style

Get the spinbox numeral value (user has to convert to float according to its digit format)
spinbox
pointer to spinbox
value integer value of the spinbox

Select next lower digit for edition by dividing the step by 10
spinbox
pointer to spinbox

Select next higher digit for edition by multiplying the step by 10
spinbox
pointer to spinbox

Increment spinbox value by one step
spinbox
pointer to spinbox

Decrement spinbox value by one step
spinbox
pointer to spinbox
